body_html: hey @carpodaster feel free to assign me to the rest of #144. I'm not sure either where to put the link to application_drafts#index but I'll go ahead and implement the functionality and leave it up to someone with more UX skills than I do to put the link in.

body: hey @carpodaster feel free to assign me to the rest of https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/144. I'm not sure either where to put the link to `application_drafts#index` but I'll go ahead and implement the functionality and leave it up to someone with more UX skills than I do to put the link in.
